alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 09 at 7:00PM AKDT until June 09 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE KUSKOKWIM DELTA NORTH AND EAST OF BETHEL... * Winds...North-northeast 15 to 25 mph. Gusts to 30 mph over elevated terrain. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Temperatures...70 to 80 degrees. * Timing...Hot, dry, and windy conditions are expected until 11 pm today. * Location...Kuskokwim Delta north and east of Bethel. This includes the villages of Bethel, Kwethluk, Akiachak, Akiak, Tuluksak, Upper and Lower Kalskag * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
